The insider claimed that Cole is not yet ready to move in with Derek Hough , explaining: Cheryl and Derek Hough have definitely been getting closer, but she wants her own life in LA- her own identity, not just as Derek Hough 's girlfriend. Sergio Marchionne will also discuss those goals at a parliamentary hearing in Rome on February 15. Sergio Marchionne and Chairman John Elkann confirmed Fiat's and Fiat Industrial SpA's intention to invest? 20 billion in Italy, the prime minister's office said in a statement today. Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so,'' David Cameron said in an e-mailed statement. Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government. -- Editors: Eddie Buckle, Anthony Aarons. To contact the reporter on this story: Robert Hutton in London at rhutton1@bloomberg.net;

I'll leave it up to my agent to work everything out.... I'm expecting everything to go according to plan. We'll see what happens over the next couple of months. I've just got to be patient and take it one day at a time. He has, at least, received a new revenue stream.
